title: FS- RARE 1925 Anonymous Postcards Ty Cobb PSA 3.5

posts.post_title: FS- RARE 1925 Anonymous Postcards Ty Cobb PSA 3.5
posts.post_content:
Gents for sale is a 1925 Anonymous Postcards Manager Ty Cobb PSA 3.5 graded. Rare Cobb card not seen too often. 


Asking $3850 OBO. Please add $19.50 for USPS-priority shipping.

PayPal FF preferred. Other payment methods accepted just need to be approved first. Add 3 percent for PP Good and Services.

Message me your email address with any questions.


Thank you for looking-
Connor
